data.name: King of Phoenix Adults Only Patch 18+
data.detailed_description: For those who want to experience King of Phoenix in its full adults only glory. This DLC adds the adults only content to the game.
data.about_the_game: For those who want to experience King of Phoenix in its full adults only glory. This DLC adds the adults only content to the game.
data.short_description: For those who want to experience King of Phoenix in its full adults only glory. This DLC adds the adults only content to the game.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: King of Phoenix involves the main character romancing women with the goal of a sexual encounter. It includes sexual themes and depictions featuring undressing, nudity and sexual interactions.
